N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 881.2 - Prohibition; sanctions

State Regulations

Any person, firm, corporation or other entity, including a
public corporation, body or agency, who shall use, withdraw or divert surface
waters of the basin, shall pay such charges therefor as may be required by this

Subchapter. Any violation of this Subchapter shall be subject to penalty as
prescribed under article 14.17 of the Compact. The commission may also recover
the value (according to the established water pricing schedules of the
commission) of any such use, withdrawal, or diversion, and invoke the
jurisdiction of the courts to enjoin any further use, withdrawal or diversion
unless all charges under this Subchapter are paid in full when
due. Notes
